description: R H Steel Building Systems (Private) Limited and two others Vs. DFCC Bank PLC and another before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J.
parties: R H Steel Building Systems (Private) Limited and two others Vs. DFCC Bank PLC and another
legistation: Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka (Article 140 – Writ jurisdiction) • Recovery of Loans by Banks (Special Provisions) Act, No. 4 of 1990 o Section 4 – Power of the bank’s board to authorize by resolution the sale of mortgaged property by public auction for recovery of loans in default. o Section 7 – Conditions subject to which Section 4 operates. o Section 13 – Recovery of costs and moneys connected to the sale. o Section 14 – Surplus from sale to be returned to borrower.
